Title: Object: Repos en Egypte
Series: Galerie du Palais Royal
Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Virgin seated against a tree in lower left while feeding Christ, St Joseph taking his donkey to a river to drink at right, a harvest scene in background; with engraved text below, within decorative frame; after Paul Bril. 1788 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: From 'Galerie du Palais Royal', see 1837,0408.317 for comment.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (71) (Couché)
Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (undescribed) (after Paul Bril)
Associated names: Associated with: Louis Philippe Joseph, duc d'Orléans
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
